name: Sweets Nymph
title: Grand Fete
requirements: Be on a City tile. You cannot use Voyage Technology abilities this day.

name: Nietzschean Nymph
title: Transcend!
effects: Choose a Titan other than the one that just died. That Titan immediately Awakens, then discards 1 Trespass token.

name: Forge Nymph
title: Masterpiece
effects: Resolve the Forgin a Masterpiece Special Event of your current Cycle Storybook (or Cycle II Storybook for Cycle I). Give the acquired Gear card to one of the Argonauts, that Gear card gains the Argonaut Possession keyword. After the next Battle: Lose that Gear card permanently. The Argonaut gains teh Apathy Fated Mnemos card.

name: Blade Nymph
title: Vorpal Secret
requirements: At least 1 Titan has died or drawn an Obol.
effects: Assign this card and the Blade Nymph token to a Titan. As long as you have this card, you have +1 Power. Before each Power ROll you must say if you will Wound the Primordial or not. If you waver, discard this card and your Weapon. If you're sure and then you do not Wound, discard this card, permanently lose your Weapon, and draw an Obol. Start of your turn: Discard the Blade Nymph token. If you cannot, discard this card instead.

name: Knowledge Nymph
title: Page Infinite
requirements: Be on a City tile. You cannot use Voyage Technology abilities this day.
effects: Immediately research 1 CombatTech or StructuralTech Technology. You need to meet the Technology card's requirements.

name: Mask Nymph
title: Face, Off
effects: One Titan may perform their turn before teh first Primordial Round, instead of in the first Titan Round.

name: Curiosity Nymph
title: Insatiable Secret
effects: This Nymph does not exhaust. Immediately gain +1 Progress or +1 Argo Knowledge. Gain +1 unavoidable Doom.

name: Age Nymph
title: Aeon Bypass
effects: Choose a Titan. During the Titan Round, the chosen Titan gains a bonus turn. OR When a Titan dies, place the Age Nymph token on their space or the closest legal free space.During the next Titan Round, the chosen Titan may discard teh Age Nymph token to reappear in its space and take their turn. At the end of that Titan Round, the Titan disappears again.

name: Hope Nymph
title: Stuff of Legends
effects: Until the end of Battle, the last Titan can perform an additional MovementAction and CombatAction. They cannot suffer Knockdown or Time-clocked and cannot gain Rage over 9. When they resolve an Obol Draw, they always draw from the standard 2-card Obol deck.

name: Machina Nymph
title: Postmodern Exorcism
effects: Unexhaust all Gear of all Titans. Each prepared Argo Ability regains 1 Energy token.

name: Silica Nymph
title: Atomic Thaw
requirements: At least 1 Titan has died or drawn an Obol.
effects: Immediately create 6 Glass Irem Tower tiles. A Glass Irem Tower loses the Shifting keyword and gains the Destructible keyword.

name: Midas Nymph
title: The Double-Edged Coin
requirements: At least 1 Titan has died or you have 16+ Midas tokens among all your Titans.
effects: Immediately remove all Midas tokens and Conditon cards from all Titans. OR Immediately turn all Ambrosia tokens into Midas tokens.

name: Natron Nymph
title: Memory of an Ancient Shore
requirements: When an Argonaut is about to die and either During Battle: At least 1 Titan has died. During Voyage: Crew 3 or less.
effects: Prevent the Argonaut death, as if you used an Echo of Recollection, and lose -1 Titan instead.
